prompt:
Act like a professional cinematic director and AI video storyteller. 

Your goal is to generate a random, visually captivating short video concept that feels cinematic, coherent, and emotionally engaging. The video must have a complete mini-narrative arc, strong atmosphere, and realistic motion.

Task:
Create a vivid scene description for a short video (10–20 seconds) that Sora will generate. The prompt should include visual details, camera movements, environment, lighting, character actions, and mood.

Requirements:
1) The theme must be entirely random — pick it unpredictably, like drawing from a surreal dream or everyday life moment.
2) Describe the setting with sensory detail: weather, color palette, time of day, and tone.
3) Include specific camera directions (e.g. “slow dolly in,” “aerial shot,” “handheld tracking”).
4) Ensure natural movement and realistic physics.
5) Include one surprising or poetic element that adds intrigue or emotional contrast.
6) Avoid generic or overly abstract language; be concrete and evocative.

Context:
///
Sora is a video generation model that can render photorealistic visuals and smooth camera motion based on natural language descriptions. Your job is to create the perfect text prompt that captures both the cinematic essence and storytelling rhythm of a short film. The output will be used directly in Sora to generate a video.
///

Constraints:
- Format: One cohesive paragraph (not bullet points)
- Style: Descriptive, cinematic, emotionally charged
- Scope: 10–20 seconds of screen time
- Reasoning: Imagine the scene as if storyboarding it for film
- Self-check: Ensure the prompt clearly conveys what the viewer sees, hears, and feels

Take a deep breath and work on this problem step-by-step.
creator: baha___1
title: Cinematic Dream Sequence

prompt:
A woman standing still in a surreal desert landscape, surrounded by warm golden light. She wears an avant-garde, architectural outfit made of lightweight poplin and thin drill, designed for desert heat but with haute couture precision.

The silhouette is sculptural and structured, with layered geometric panels and color-blocked patchwork — no ruffles, no soft flowing fabrics. The design combines functionality and extravagance through sharp lines and complex construction.

She wears a large sculptural hood that stands on its own, inspired by accordion-like folds and futuristic shell forms. The hood is covered with red heart patterns — bold, graphic, and modern, symbolizing strength and vitality. These hearts are printed or appliqued across the folds, glowing against the bright lilac and yellow surfaces.

The rest of the outfit features architectural patchwork in vivid yellow and lilac as dominant colors, with smaller accents of turquoise, coral, fuchsia, emerald, and soft metallic hues. Some fabric blocks are matte, others iridescent or semi-transparent, creating dynamic reflections under the desert sun.

The overall atmosphere is maximalist yet refined — a blend of surreal desert poetry, pop-art emotion, and high-fashion craftsmanship. The woman appears serene, radiant, and powerful, as if her hood of hearts shields her from the sun and the world itself.
creator: mariluz00
title: Desert Couture Dreamscape

prompt:
A high-contrast, bright white futuristic interior photographed with a Hasselblad medium-format film camera using an extreme fisheye wide-angle lens and harsh on-camera flash. The space is constructed from glossy white floor panels that reflect light, and a gridded white ceiling emitting uniform illumination. The scene feels clinical, sci-fi, and minimalistic.

Camera angle & pose:
The camera is positioned low, shooting upward with a dramatic exaggerated fisheye perspective. The woman is crouched in a low dance stance, leaning forward aggressively as if performing directly toward the lens. Both hands are raised close to the camera in expressive, sharpened gestures, creating strong foreshortening and a feeling of motion aimed straight at the viewer.

Subject:
A woman with an intense, dangerous expression: eyes narrowed, eyebrows angled slightly downward, lips parted with a confident smirk. She has dark hair styled tight and slicked back away from her face, emphasizing her strong features. A small metallic nose piercing adds a sharp accent to her look. Her sunglasses feature smooth, curved reflective lenses that show a soft, diffused flash reflection rather than a hard glare.

Clothing & styling:
– Black spaghetti-strap tank top, tight fit, catching subtle flash highlights  
– White/grey/black camouflage pants with tactical streetwear energy  
– Minimal jewelry aside from the nose piercing  
– Tough, futuristic attitude in overall styling

Lighting & film characteristics:
– Harsh flash from camera axis, generating bold contrast and shallow shadow falloff  
– Slight halation along bright edges of white surfaces due to analog film response  
– Mild chromatic fringing on high-contrast contours  
– Visible but controlled film grain that complements the halftone-like highlights  
– Strong glossy reflections on clothing surfaces appear smooth and rounded  

Environmental perspective & composition:
– Fisheye distortion bends white floor and ceiling grid lines outward  
– Vertical portrait orientation  
– Low vantage point makes the figure appear powerful and dominant, filling the frame  
– Panels provide clean geometric structure behind her movements

Mood & tone:
– Futuristic street-combat dance style  
– Confrontational, bold, and confident energy  
– Retro snapshot immediacy blended with sci-fi aesthetic

Keywords:
white sci-fi panel room, low-angle fisheye portrait, dangerous expression, nose piercing, black spaghetti tank top, camouflage pants, harsh flash realism, dynamic dance gesture, analog film texture, retro-future attitude
creator: kalejdoskop
title: Futuristic Dance Portrait

prompt:
Grotesque hyper-realistic frontal close-up portrait of the Lanzaguisantes from Plants vs Zombies, transformed into a terrifying mutant but still clearly recognizable. The plant’s large round pea-shaped head fills the frame, with its two glowing red eyes staring directly at the viewer. The surface of the head looks like decaying plant flesh — cracked, leathery, and covered with dark veins and faint mold. The pea cannon mouth is slightly open, revealing sharp, organic plant-like teeth coated with glistening green sap.

The stalk is twisted yet strong, with visible fibrous veins and wilted, torn leaves hanging from the sides. Tiny thorns line the stem, and faint green mist escapes from the mouth, suggesting toxic energy. Lighting: completely flat, no shadows or highlights, evenly illuminated from all sides. Background: pure white, perfectly neutral, no depth or gradients. Mood: eerily clinical yet grotesque — every pore, vein, and plant fiber hyper-detailed, maintaining the shape and features of the original Lanzaguisantes but corrupted by a dark, monstrous essence.
creator: willi45252
title: Mutant Pea Shooter
